duties_responsibilities.duty: Set-up, edit programming, and operate lathes, mills, manual, and CNC machines to manufacture products.
Prioritize and coordinate machine shop assignments based on knowledge of products and current specifications.
Maintain CNC machines, clean and organize work area, and follow procedures and specifications.
Participate in R&D and product design projects, as needed.
Train co-workers in job functions, adhere to shop and safety procedures, and perform all other duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. Completion of sixty (60) hour CNC Programming Course, AA degree, or AS equivalent in Machine Shop training desired but not required.
